participant_1.background:
I'm not a fan of Comic Con, but I do enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I want to show my music to the world!
I like a soft bed for my baby.
i have a missing pinky toe.

participant_2.background:
I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced.
i like to hunt for my food.
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
i sing in the school chorus.
i once saw peyton manning at the grocery store.

content.text: Hi, I'm currently pregnant with my second child.
Thank you! I'm really excited, but also a little nervous.
That's totally understandable! I'm sure you'll be a great mom.
I hope so! I love making organic cat food for my furry friend.
That's so sweet! I love animals too. I once saw Peyton Manning at the grocery store!
Really? That's so cool! I'm not a big football fan, but I can appreciate a good athlete.
Yeah, he was really nice. I was in line behind him and he just started chatting with me.
That's so cool! I'm glad you had a good experience.
I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced.
That sounds delicious! I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
You should try hunting! It's really fun and you get to eat some amazing food.
I've never been hunting before, but I'd be willing to try it!
You should! It's a lot of fun and you get to eat some amazing food.
